@id: TO_BE_ADDED, this is like an IRI for the JSON-LD itself
name: TO_BE_ADDED
description: Amplicon Sequence Variants from an 18S rRNA sample from Fram Strait collected for the GLOMICON intercomparison project
license: TO_BE_ADDED, assume tat this will be CC-BY, but this needs to be decided together with the partners

variableMeasured.name: DNA sequence
variableMeasured.description: number and order of nucleotides of the V4 region of the 18S rRNA gene in a DNA sequence

variableMeasured.name: Quality value
variableMeasured.description: Probability that the corresponding base call is incorrect

includedInDataCatalog: TO_BE_ADDED, will later be populated with the name of the repository which will host the data

provider.legalName: Alfred Wegener Institut, Helmholtz-Zentrum für Polar- und Meeresforschung
provider.name: Alfred Wegener Institut, Helmholtz-Zentrum für Polar- und Meeresforschung
